2023
Advanced Methods in Data Science: Theory and Applications
Your Name, Emily Chen (Eds.)
Springer Publishing (2023) | Chapter 7: Advancements in Natural Language Processing, pp. 143-172
This chapter provides a comprehensive overview of recent advancements in Natural Language Processing (NLP). It covers transformer-based architectures, few-shot learning, and interpretability methods. The chapter also includes a detailed case study on applying these techniques to sentiment analysis in social media data.
Natural Language Processing Transformers Book Chapter
Your Name & Chen, E. (2023). Advancements in Natural Language Processing. In Your Name & E. Chen (Eds.), Advanced Methods in Data Science: Theory and Applications (pp. 143-172). Springer.
Publisher Link Author Preprint
Comparative Analysis of Deep Learning Techniques for Image Segmentation
Robert Johnson, Your Name, Lisa Wang
IEEE Transactions on Image Processing (2023) | Vol. 32, No. 4, pp. 1245-1259
In this paper, we present a comprehensive comparative analysis of state-of-the-art deep learning techniques for image segmentation. We evaluate performance across multiple datasets and introduce a novel hybrid approach that combines the strengths of U-Net and Transformer architectures. Our experiments demonstrate significant improvements in segmentation accuracy while maintaining computational efficiency.
Computer Vision Deep Learning Image Segmentation
Johnson, R., Your Name, & Wang, L. (2023). Comparative Analysis of Deep Learning Techniques for Image Segmentation. IEEE Transactions on Image Processing, 32(4), 1245-1259. https://doi.org/10.xxxx/xxxxx
